snippet: Raffi Torres was suspended after a devastating hit on Chicago’s Marian Hossa on April 21. A date for his appeal has not been set.
lead_paragraph: Raffi Torres was suspended after a devastating hit on Chicago’s Marian Hossa on April 21. A date for his appeal has not been set.

headline.seo: Coyotes’ Raffi Torres Will Appeal 25-Game Suspension
headline.main: Coyotes’ Torres Planning to Appeal 25-Game Ban
headline.print_headline: Coyotes’ Torres Planning To Appeal 25-Game Ban
